product_name: Perfumed Bubble Hand Wash Hotel Wood (1,030ml*2ea)
description:
Description


HOTEL WOOD SCENT: Immerse in the deep, woody aroma of Hotel Wood. This luxurious scent combines the earthiness of forest soil with the rich, enduring fragrance of aged trees, bringing a touch of sophistication to your daily routine.
EXCEPTIONAL CAPACITY: Hetras Perfume Bubble Hand Wash boasts a generous 17.4 fl oz (515ml) capacity, providing up to three times the usage compared to typical 6.76 fl oz (200ml) hand washes on the market. This large size ensures longevity and value, making it a practical choice for families and frequent hand washers.
SKIN-COMFORTING pH BALANCE: With a pH level of 5.6, this mildly acidic hand wash is crafted for optimal skin comfort, helping maintain moisture balance and skin health. It's gentle enough for all skin types, promoting a soothing hand washing experience without drying out the skin.
NATURALLY NOURISHING INGREDIENTS: Infused with 3,000 ppm of goat's milk, cypress water, and tea tree extract, Hetras hand wash not only moisturizes the hands but also enhances skin protection and nourishment. Its hypoallergenic, family-friendly formula ensures safe use for everyone, providing peace of mind with every wash.
THE GIFT OF CLEAN LUXURY: Offering more than just cleansing, Hetras Perfume Bubble Hand Wash is a thoughtful gift that delivers sincerity and appreciation. Its luxurious foam and premium scent make it an ideal present for expressing gratitude and care to your loved ones.

product_name: Perfumed Mango Seed Butter Hand Cream 50ml (5 types)
description:
Description


5 VARIETY OF SIGNATURE SCENTS: Explore the unique olfactory experiences with HETRAS Perfume Hand Cream, available in five captivating scents: Hinoki, Flower Shop, Muhwagwa, Hug Soap, and Hotel Wood. Each scent is meticulously crafted to evoke distinct moods and settings, making this hand cream an exceptional gift with a sensuous design.
RICH PLANT-DERIVED NOURISHMENT: Infused with a potent blend of natural ingredients such as Danish Mango Seed Butter, Shea Butter, and Jojoba Seed Oil, HETRAS hand cream offers deep nourishment and moisturization. This plant-derived formula promotes healthy skin without any stickiness.
ENDURING FRAGRANCE DELIGHT: Enjoy a long-lasting, subtle fragrance that stays with you throughout the day. For an extended aroma, apply the hand cream to pulse points like wrists and hair tips. It’s a luxurious alternative to perfume, offering a lingering scent that enhances your natural elegance.
SILKY SMOOTH ABSORPTION: Experience the luxurious, quick-absorbing texture of HETRAS hand cream. Designed to leave your hands feeling silky and soft without any greasiness, this cream delivers moisture and smoothness immediately upon application.
SKIN-FRIENDLY FORMULATION: Carefully formulated to be gentle on all skin types, this hand cream uses hypoallergenic ingredients that minimize the risk of irritation. It provides a comforting and soothing treatment that's as gentle as it is effective.
 
How To Use

After washing hands, take adequate amount of the product and gently massage.
 
Key Ingredients

Contains mango seed butter from Denmark that is more moisturizing than regular shea butter and 6 kinds of plant-oriented ingredients to provide non-sticky and silky finish.
Made with fresh mango seed butter from Denmark rich in nutrients for softness.
The mango seed butter that has excellent moisturizing and skin elasticity effects results in nourished hands to make soft skin texture.
The 5 layer of mango seed butter ceramide provides instant refreshing moisturizing right after use.
Contains a high content of mango seed butter ceramide to improve skin barrier that is weakened by external irritations.

product_name: *renewal* Dual Effect Nail and Cuticle Care Essence Oil Pen 2ml
description:
Description

Revitalize your nail care routine with the Dual Effect 2-in-1 Nail & Cuticle Oil Pen with Ceramic Pusher. This innovative tool combines a nourishing oil pen with a ceramic stone pusher to deliver exceptional cuticle and nail care. Infused with a blend of high-quality oils, it ensures your nails and cuticles receive the essential nutrients they need for optimal health and appearance. Enjoy the subtle, uplifting scent of cotton blossom while benefiting from the rich, natural ingredients.
What It Is
A dual-purpose nail and cuticle care tool featuring a nourishing oil pen and a ceramic stone pusher for comprehensive care.Concerns: Dry, ragged cuticles, rough cuticles, frequent use of gel nails or nail stickers, nails needing extra nourishment.

Scent
Subtle cotton blossom fragrance for a pleasant and refreshing experience.Texture: Light, non-greasy oil that absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving a residue.

Features
Dual Functionality: Combines a nourishing oil pen and a ceramic pusher for all-in-one cuticle and nail care.
Portable Design: Convenient pocket size for easy use anytime, anywhere.
Natural Ingredients: Made with a blend of high-quality oils for effective nail and cuticle nourishment.


BENEFITS
Complete Cuticle Care: Provides nourishment and gentle management of cuticles with one product.
Hydration and Nourishment: Rich oils deeply hydrate and nourish cuticles and nails, improving overall health.
Portable and Convenient: Easy to carry and use on the go, perfect for maintaining nail care anywhere.
Gentle and Effective: Ceramic pusher designed for light use, ensuring safe and effective cuticle management.

How To Use
Step 1
Open the cap of the brush section and twist the bottom of the container in a clockwise direction. For first-time use, twist a bit more to allow the content to come out under pressure.
Step 2
Once the oil starts to adhere to the brush, gently apply it to the nails and cuticle line to allow it to penetrate.
Step 3
Use the pusher end to gently push loose skin inward.
Step 4
Use the pusher surface to remove excess cuticle by drawing circles.
Step 5
Finally, apply the brush to the nails and cuticle line.
Tip: Apply the oil pen frequently when it is dry for best results.

This product is not intended for removing large amounts of cuticle. For significant cuticle buildup, a cuticle clipper may be needed. The ceramic pusher is designed for light use, ideal for gently tidying small amounts of cuticle or for pushing cuticles back before trimming with a nail clipper.

Key Ingredients
[Key Ingredients]
Jojoba Seed Oil: Hydrates and conditions cuticles and nails while mimicking the natural oils of the skin.Sweet Almond Oil: Provides deep moisture and helps to soothe and soften dry cuticles.
Rose Hip Oil: Rich in essential fatty acids and antioxidants, promoting healthy skin and nail growth.
Olive Oil: Nourishes and protects the skin, providing a barrier to prevent moisture loss.
Sunflower Seed Oil: High in vitamin E, it helps to strengthen and protect nails while keeping cuticles soft.
Hazelnut Oil: Light and non-greasy, it moisturizes and nourishes without clogging pores.

Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil), Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Corylus Americana (Hazelnut) Seed Oil, Hexyl Cinnamal, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes.

reviews.content: Strength my nails this is my second purchase

reviews.title: Only if it was unscented
reviews.content: I love the concept and design of the oil pen, but I am not a fan of the smell. Other than that the ceramic pusher works great (my favorite feature) and the cuticle essence texture is quite moisturizing.

reviews.title: my husband loves it
reviews.content: It is nail oil pen + ceramic pusher All-in-one care for nail nutrition and cuticles at once

reviews.title: good
reviews.content: i like this cuticle oil witht he pusher

reviews.title: great
reviews.content: Good for my cuticles, moisturizing and clean my cuticles without pain, but it would be perfect if i could refill ir with any oil but i couldn’t

description:
Description
Provides seamless glow and moisture while enjoying KEYTH's signature scent for a long time.AT HER APARTMENT : A hand cream that delivers a refreshing feeling with its invigorating scent.DROPPED PEARL OF DRAGON : This hand cream boasts a dewy aroma that lingers on your fingertips. It combines notes of eucalyptus, galbanium, patchouli, and gaiacwood.EPIC FLEUR : A hand cream with a rich scent reminiscent of an age-old epic's flower. Its soft yet sumptuous sweetness blooms at your fingertips like a crescent moon.HIPNOTIC FOG : A hand cream with a dreamy scent that makes you feel as if you're in love. The fresh eucalyptus forest you encounter while strolling through thick fog and the hints of delicate geraniums invite you into a fragrant hypnotic state.SILENT : There are moments when everyone needs a quiet space away from the noise of the world. KEYTH's Fragrance-Free Hand Cream, Silent, focuses on the value of pure hand cream.SO BLACK OUD : A hand cream that offers a unique charm with the harmonious blend of cedarwood, soft vanilla amber, and patchouli scents.UNTIED ARROW : A hand cream with a scent that conjures the sensation of a gentle breeze lingering pleasantly on your fingertips. 
How To UseTake an appropriate amount of this product and spread evenly on the skin.

product_name: Shea Butter & Rice Bran Hand Cream 50ml
description:
Description

Mary&May Shea Butter & Rice Bran Hand Cream (Unscented, deeply moisturizing for dry hands)&
Enriched with shea butter, this fragrance-free hand cream provides long-lasting hydration without stickiness.

Intensive care for dry skin or light daily care.

Enriched with shea butter, this fragrance-free hand cream provides long-lasting hydration without stickiness.

If fragrance-free formula makes it easy to use anytime, anywhere, offering comfort throughout the day

"Mary&May is committed to sustainability, creating products with materials designed for easy disposal Instead of complex multi-material tubes that are difficult to recycle, we use aluminum tubes throughout, including the nozzle and interior, for easy recycling."

100% Vegan, No animal testing, Dermatologically tested, Allergen free

- Clean Beauty
- Dermatologically tested
- All EWG green grade
- Cruelty Free
- Vegan Certified
 
How To Use
Apply an appropriate amount to your hands whenever they feel dry.
 
Key Ingredients
Aqua(Water), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, Caprylyl Methicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Behenyl Alcohol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene, Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Sorbitan Isostearate, Disodium EDTA, Ceramide NP, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol

description:
Description
What it is:
A fast-absorbing nourishing vegan hand cream to hydrate and nourish dry skin with soothing extracts from Asian Medicinal plants and scented with Melixir's signature aroma inspired by nature to leave a subtle scent on your hands.
What it does:
The easily-absorbed cream leaves your hands deliciously scented with an earthy, spicy heart of sage and vetiver mellowed by a woody trail with hints of cedarwood. Enriched with over 10 Asian medicinal plant extracts, moisturizing shea butter and a plant-derived ceramide, our vegan hand cream helps seal in moisture and condition skin to keep your hands feeling soft.
What else you need to know:
• Hinoki/Hinokitiol: Contains anti-inflammatory (acne), anti-bacteria, anti-aging properties • Willow Bark Extract: Helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles • Shea Butter: Locks in moisture for lasting hydration • Ceramide: Supports the skin barrier and conditions the skin to prevent dryness and moisture loss

Apply an appropriate amount onto the desired area.

description:
Description


[Key Features]

- It gently softens calluses with natural ingredients, avoiding harsh chemicals.

- With a large capacity of 100ml, it provides long-lasting usage over an extended period.

 

Why it's special:

- No need to soak, just spray and wait for 1 minute, then scrape it off!

- Gently on the skin with 13 natural-derived ingredients(Tested on the skin for irritation and proven to be non-irritating.)

 
Highly recommended for people who want&need:

- For those who have thick calluses that are difficult to remove with just a foot file

- For those who want to remove calluses with a gentle approach

- For those who prefer a non-irritating product for callus removal

How To Use

1. Spray an ample amount of Softner onto the areas with callus cells.

2. After 1 minute, gently file using the coarse side of the foot file." 

* Peeling Foot Spray is a product designed to soften calluses. After applying the spray, it is recommended to use a foot file to gently remove the softened calluses in order to see the desired effect.

product_name: Callus Remover Kit for Feet: Foot File & Peeling Foot Spray
description:
Description-  Effortless foot care at home. Enjoy the luxury of salon-quality foot care from the comfort of your home.- This innovative set features a potent foot softening spray that simplifies callus removal in just one minute. 

- ONLY 1-MINUTE SPRAY & PEEL IS ENOUGH : Experience immediate results with our foot callus remover. When used with the accompanying foot spray, it peels away dead skin in just a minute – no water required. You can also use callus remover on your dry feet. Bring professional foot salon care to your home.
- SKIN-FRIENDLY SPRAY WITH 13 NATURAL-DEVIED INGREDIENTS AND ADDITIONAL MOISTURIZATION : Spray ingredients are tested for irritation and proven non-irritating. Also, it contains moisturizing ingredients so you can keep your feet moistly! Feel safe and comfortable to enjoy our products.
- DUAL-SIDED FOOT FILE THAT IS APPLICABLE TO ANY TYPE OF SKIN : The rear side is designed to combat thick and stubborn dead skin, while the front side deals with minor and residual dead skin. Enjoy the convenience of a single, multifunctional tool for efficient callus removal.
- INTENSIVE HEALING FOR CRACKED AND DRY HEELS: Our foot cream lotion, enriched with urea and glycerin, deeply moisturizes your feet, transforming rough skin into incredibly smooth and soft heels.

description:
Description

These slip on 30 minute peeling foot mask removes dead skin.
It hydrates dry and rough skin without pain or irritation. Provides rich nutrition and moisturizes the feet.

Suggested Use

1. After wash feet and dried, cut socks down the middle.
2. Wrap the sticky band around the socks to secure onto feet.
3. After 30 minutes, remove socks and rinse feet in warm water.
4. Peeling will start to take effect 4-6 days after use, dry skin will shed naturally to reveal smoother softer feet.

Ingredients

WATER, ALCOHOL, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, LACTIC ACID, GLYCOLIC ACID, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, ARGININE , HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE , PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, PHENOXYETHANOL, SALICYLIC ACID , 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, FRAGRANCE, ILLICIUM VERUM (ANISE) FRUIT EXTRACT, DISODIUM EDTA, UREA, CITRUS AURANTIFOLIA (LIME) FRUIT EXTRACT, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) FRUIT EXTRACT, PYRUS MALUS (APPLE) FRUIT EXTRACT, CITRUS LIMON (LEMON) FRUIT EXTRACT, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) FRUIT EXTRACT, MENTHA ROTUNDIFOLIA LEAF EXTRACT, MENTHA PIPERITA (PEPPERMINT) LEAF EXTRACT, MENTHA VIRIDIS (SPEARMINT) LEAF EXTRACT, PORTULACA OLERACEA EXTRACT, EUTERPE OLERACEA FRUIT EXTRACT, NEOFINETIA FALCATA CALLUS CULTURE EXTRACT, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN
